bwwExcerpt: Imagine an awkwardly sardonic, parrot-death-denying, Inquisition-ambushed, Cambridge-educated Monty Python's Flying Circus troupe portraying the 'Seinfeld' cast, and you're liable to understand the lure of the Mischief Theatre Company's antics. Sometimes, 'Peter Pan Goes Wrong' goes long and belabors its physical and vocal antics. But in general, too much of a good thing is a great thing here.
